reviews.review_msg: Great Guy, Great Prof! Dutton is truly passionate about what he teaches and because he is so passionate he finds himself going off on tangents, nevertheless hes a great lecturer one of the best, only problem was his class was at 8:30am hard to listen for a two hour class, and his final wasnt the best, ill be taking another class with him for sure!

He is a nice professor who is very knowledgeable and willing to help students. However, this class is not meant for non-history or english majors as an elective. Excellent professor, boring course. Will need a laptop to keep up with lectures, every five seconds is a new point.
Awesome Prof! Lectures and tutorials are engaging.
